solution_line_template: In total {first_day_rainfall} + {second_day_rainfall} + {third_day_rainfall} = <<{first_day_rainfall}+{second_day_rainfall}+{third_day_rainfall}={total_rainfall_this_year}>>{total_rainfall_this_year} cm fell for three days.

If {average_rainfall_normal_year} cm is the average for the first three days, then {average_rainfall_normal_year} - {total_rainfall_this_year} = <<{average_rainfall_normal_year}-{total_rainfall_this_year}={less_than_average}>>{less_than_average} cm less than the average.
